column4: Hey all, for some reason Gparted is taking one heck of a long time to expand my SDA1 volume... (hours upon hours), anyone know why this might be ?
(fast enough computer, really shouldn't take that long. 4gb ram 2.6ghz)
how much data you got on it? and if it was a windows partition did you defrag before?
running live DVD of ubuntu 8.04m disk size 250GB expanding to 500GB..
the expansion is a windows partition, yes
the space that it is being expanded into, is it free or being moved?
hmm, not sure why it is taking so long then, how long has it been running, and what is it doing at the moment?
2 hour estimated finish time. been running for 30 mintues now
not sure why it is taking so long
